info.title: ITA Profiles page API documentation
info.description:
Documentation needed for the API Rest for the ITA Profiles page to IT Academy. Some useful links below:
 *   [ITA Profles Backend](https://github.com/IT-Academy-BCN/ita-profiles-backend)
 *   [ITA Profiles Frontend](https://github.com/IT-Academy-BCN/ita-profiles-frontend)

get.description:
Get a list of all students registered with the Profile-Home fields in Figma Design.

    No authentication required

Retrieves a paginated list of students.

    No authentication required

200.description: Successful operation. Returns a list of students.

post.description:
Creates a new student with the provided data.
  • Name and Surname are required.
  • Status can be 'Active', 'Inactive', 'In a Bootcamp' or 'In a Job'.
  • Active status is set by default.
  • Authentication is not required.

photo.description: URL to the photo of the student

201.description: Student created successfully. No token is returned.

400.description: Bad request when data validation fails

message.example: Registre no efectuat. Si-us-plau, torna-ho a provar.

get.description:
Get the details of a specific student by UUID.

    No authentication required

put.description:
Update the details of a specific Student.
  • Name and Surname are required.
  • Status can be 'Active', 'Inactive', 'In a Bootcamp' or 'In a Job'.
  • Active status is set by default.
  • Authentication is not required.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of the Student to be updated.

requestBody.description: New data to update the student with that UUID.

photo.description: URL to the photo of the student

message.example: Something went wrong. Try it again later.

delete.description:
Delete a specific Student by his UUID.

    No authentication required

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of the Student to be deleted
